std_narrative.citation:
Henry was convicted on 26 July 1832 in Suffolk Assizes, Suffolk, England, and sentenced to 14 years transportation and transported on 28 September 1832 on the ship ''Georgiana''. '''Convict Transportation''': "United Kingdom, Convict Transportation Registers"
